languages.text: "Кораблем? Нет никакого корабля. Есть чистилище, мир зла, созданный, чтобы пытать и мучить следующих за Омниссией. Оно уже убило многих моих братьев... но оставшиеся сильны, очень сильны. Мы сдержим осквернение Машины. Я! Я! Я сдержу".

traits.locale_text: "Кораблем? Нет никакого корабля. Есть чистилище, мир зла, созданный, чтобы пытать и мучить следующих за Омниссией. Оно уже убило многих моих братьев… но оставшиеся сильны, очень сильны. Мы сдержим осквернение машины. Я! Я! Я сдержу".

languages.text: "Ship? There is no ship. There is only purgatory, a world of evil, made to harrow and torture those who follow the Omnissiah. It has already killed many of my brethren... but those who remain are strong, so very strong. We will keep the corruption of the Machine at bay. I will! I will hold it back."
languages.original_text: "Кораблем? Нет никакого корабля. Есть чистилище, мир зла, созданный, чтобы пытать и мучить следующих за Омниссией. Оно уже убило многих моих братьев... но оставшиеся сильны, очень сильны. Мы сдержим осквернение Машины. Я! Я! Я сдержу".

It has already killed many of my brethren... but those who remain are strong, so very strong. We will hold off the corruption of the Machine. I will! I will hold it off."

It has already killed many of my brethren... but those who remain are strong, so very strong. We will keep the corruption of the Machine at bay. I will! I will hold it back."

It has already killed many of my brethren... but those who remain are strong, so very strong. We will keep the corruption of the Machine at bay. I will! I will hold it back."

It has already killed many of my brethren... but those who remain are strong, so very strong. We will keep the corruption of the Machine at bay. I will! I will hold it back."

languages.text: “飞船？这里根本没有什么飞船，只有炼狱。这里只有邪恶的世界，用来折磨、摧残欧姆尼塞亚的信徒。它已经杀害了我无数兄弟……但那些活下来的人很强大，非常强大。我们会阻止机器的腐化。我会的！我会阻止它的！”
languages.original_text: "Ship? There is no ship. There is only purgatory, a world of evil, made to harrow and torture those who follow the Omnissiah. It has already killed many of my brethren... but those who remain are strong, so very strong. We will keep the corruption of the Machine at bay. I will! I will hold it back."

traits.locale_text: “飞船？这里根本没有什么飞船，只有炼狱。这里只有邪恶的世界，用来折磨、摧残欧姆尼塞亚的信徒。它已经杀害了我无数兄弟……但那些活下来的人很强大，非常强大。我们会阻止机器的腐化。我会的！我会阻止它的！”

languages.text: «¿Nave? No hay nave. Solo hay un purgatorio, un mundo maligno, hecho para aplastar y torturar a quienes seguimos al Omnissiah. Ya ha matado a muchos de mis hermanos... pero los que quedamos somos fuertes. Muy fuertes. Mantendremos a raya la corrupción de la máquina. ¡Yo lo haré! La contendré».
languages.original_text: "Ship? There is no ship. There is only purgatory, a world of evil, made to harrow and torture those who follow the Omnissiah. It has already killed many of my brethren... but those who remain are strong, so very strong. We will keep the corruption of the Machine at bay. I will! I will hold it back."

traits.locale_text: «¿Nave? No hay nave. Solo hay un purgatorio, un mundo maligno, hecho para aplastar y torturar a quienes seguimos al Omnissiah. Ya ha matado a muchos de mis hermanos... pero los que quedamos somos fuertes. Muy fuertes. Mantendremos a raya la corrupción de la máquina. ¡Yo lo haré! La contendré».

languages.text: 「船？船などない。あるのはあらゆる悪、断罪者のみ。万機神に従った者を苦しめて拷問するのだ。すでに多くの同胞が命を取られた…しかし生き残った同胞は強い、それもとてつもなく。我々は機械の腐敗を食い止める。絶対に！阻止してやる」
languages.original_text: "Ship? There is no ship. There is only purgatory, a world of evil, made to harrow and torture those who follow the Omnissiah. It has already killed many of my brethren... but those who remain are strong, so very strong. We will keep the corruption of the Machine at bay. I will! I will hold it back."

traits.locale_text: 「船？船などない。あるのはあらゆる悪、断罪者のみ。万機神に従った者を苦しめて拷問するのだ。すでに多くの同胞が命を取られた…しかし生き残った同胞は強い、それもとてつもなく。我々は機械の腐敗を食い止める。絶対に！阻止してやる」

languages.text: "Schiff? Es gibt kein Schiff. Es gibt nur das Fegefeuer, eine Welt des Bösen, um jene zu peinigen und zu foltern, die dem Omnissiah folgen. Viele meine Brüder wurden schon getötet ... aber die Verbliebenen sind stark, sehr stark. Wir werden die Korruption der Maschine im Zaum halten. Ich werde es tun! Ich werde sie eindämmen."
languages.original_text: "Ship? There is no ship. There is only purgatory, a world of evil, made to harrow and torture those who follow the Omnissiah. It has already killed many of my brethren... but those who remain are strong, so very strong. We will keep the corruption of the Machine at bay. I will! I will hold it back."

traits.locale_text: "Schiff? Es gibt kein Schiff. Es gibt nur das Fegefeuer, eine Welt des Bösen, um jene zu peinigen und zu foltern, die dem Omnissiah folgen. Viele meine Brüder wurden schon getötet ... aber die Verbliebenen sind stark, sehr stark. Wir werden die Korruption der Maschine im Zaum halten. Ich werde es tun! Ich werde sie eindämmen."

languages.text: « Quel vaisseau ? Il n'y a pas de vaisseau. Juste le purgatoire, un monde malfaisant conçu pour meurtrir et torturer les disciples de l'Omnimessie. Il a déjà tué bon nombre de mes frères... mais ceux qui ont survécu sont forts, très forts. Nous tiendrons la corruption de la Machine en respect. Je ne faillirai pas ! Je l'empêcherai de se propager. »
languages.original_text: "Ship? There is no ship. There is only purgatory, a world of evil, made to harrow and torture those who follow the Omnissiah. It has already killed many of my brethren... but those who remain are strong, so very strong. We will keep the corruption of the Machine at bay. I will! I will hold it back."

traits.locale_text: « Quel vaisseau ? Il n'y a pas de vaisseau. Juste le purgatoire, un monde malfaisant conçu pour meurtrir et torturer les disciples de l'Omnimessie. Il a déjà tué bon nombre de mes frères... mais ceux qui ont survécu sont forts, très forts. Nous tiendrons la corruption de la Machine en respect. Je ne faillirai pas ! Je l'empêcherai de se propager. »

languages.text: "Gemi mi? Burada gemi yok. Yalnızca araf var, Hermesih'in yolunu izleyenlere eziyet etmek için şerle dolup taşan bir dünya var. Hâlihazırda pek çok kardeşim canından oldu... Sağ kalanlarsa güçlüler, hem de çok. Makine'nin yozluğunun yayılmasına izin vermeyeceğiz. En başta ben izin vermeyeceğim! Onu zapt edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Ship? There is no ship. There is only purgatory, a world of evil, made to harrow and torture those who follow the Omnissiah. It has already killed many of my brethren... but those who remain are strong, so very strong. We will keep the corruption of the Machine at bay. I will! I will hold it back."

Sağ kalanlarsa güçlüler, hem de çok. Makine'nin yozluğunun yayılmasına izin vermeyeceğiz. En başta ben izin vermeyeceğim! Onu zapt edeceğim."
